Articles.Content:
When I go in the SPH, I cant switch to mirror symmetry (I can, but it switches back to radial.)

Help?

**Edited <time datetime="2015-07-11T15:42:42Z" title="07/11/2015 03:42  PM" data-short="8 yr">July 11, 2015</time> by matissVEVO**

If you have any parts that were placed with radial symmetry, then the symmetry indicator will automatically switch over to radial when you mouse over with the new part.

The same happens with parts placed in mirror symmetry, radial will switch over to mirror.

To solve, just avoid mousing over the parts placed in radial symmetry when placing the next part.

Avoiding hovering over other parts is handy advice. If you do have to mouse over those other parts, you can also press 'R' and 'F' to switch symmetry modes. 'X' will increase and decrease symmetry count if you need to adjust after flipping modes.

Cheers,

-Claw
